Articles.Content:
Hi.

Here is a small tweak to TechTree.cfg. It's not a mod, just corrected alignment and size.

Sorry if I violate the copyrights. Glad if it will be useful for anybody.

Spoiler

Before:

After:

 

Spoiler

Small update

I like that it fits my smaller screen.

Just FYI, those three nodes on the beginning, if you pay attention they don't cost exactly the same, which is why they're not perfectly lined up in the stock tree
Yep, I didn't noticed that because there are too small differences in their cost. I can fix their coordinates if it's necessary.

I like it!

Great first post, it's rare someone starts off with a contribution instead of a question.

Also, welcome to the forums!
